title: oc 5.0.10 sharing: username not found
body:
### expected behaviour
when sharing a folder to choose from both username und full name

### actual behaviour
i can find the user to which i want to share only with his full name not the username

### steps to reproduce
1. share a folder
2. search the username (no hit)
3. search full name 

### server configuration
operating system: centos 5.9

web server: apache 2.2.3

database: mysql 5

php version: 5.4

owncloud version: 5.0.10

### client configuration
browser:: firefox

operating system: linux

### logs
#### web server error log
```
insert your webserver log here
```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
no logs
```

#### browser log
```
insert your browser log here, this could for example include:

a) the javascript console log
b) the network log 
c) ...
```
